title: SCODI Mens Polo Shirts Performance Short Sleeve Tactical Shirts Athletic Golf Shirt for Men Daily Casual Collared T-Shirt
description: FABRIC: Men's golf polo shirts are made of high quality fabrics. The fabric is covered with tiny air holes, which can effectively sweat. Let you stay comfortable in hot summer

BUTTON PLACKET DESIGN: This men's short sleeve polo shirt has a classic button placket, which is convenient to wear. The style is classic never out of date. It is one of the necessary polo shirts in summer

SPEIAL DESIGN OF MEN'S POLO: The ring buckle design under the placket is convenient for carrying sunglasses/microphones. Sleeve pocket design makes it easy to carry small items such as keys/headphones
APPLICABLE OCCASIONS: Classic and versatile styles can be used as golf polo shirts, tennis polo shirts, bowling polo shirts, business polo shirts, tactical polo shirts or everyday wear
TIPS: Machine washable. Standard size. You can refer to the size table to choose the size
